name: ext_R2_DeviceComponent
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.DeviceComponent for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents DeviceComponent from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DeviceComponent|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: An instance of a medical-related component of a medical device
element.definition: Describes the characteristics, operational status and capabilities of a medical-related component of a medical device.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both
